entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
